basics.name: John Gafnea
basics.label: Infrastructure Engineer
basics.summary: Hi, I'm a seasoned professional with ten years in IT, mostly focusing on deploying infrastructure, supporting users, and finding ways to make things easier. Additionally, I bring a background in service and hospitality, so I can effectively "do the needful" working with machines and humans alike (kidding, but serious).

projects.name: Bookish
projects.description: CLI tool created to search and download eBooks without spammy websites. Uses LibGen API to search books and resolve mirror links to direct downloads.

projects.name: Tray CGM
projects.description: Desktop application created to display glucose reading in system tray. Service polls medical device API and updates icon with latest values.

projects.name: Startup
projects.description: Website for fictional startup created to see what's possible without JavaScript. Content fetched from APIs and combined to form nonsense pitch ideas.
